title: FadedV1rtue
author: FadedV1rtue
content: Hello, I was wondering if anyone here is willing to purchase something on amazon for me if I send you the amount the product costs in crypto + some extra money for the inconvenience it causes you. Right now I'm currently using purse.io to purchase things on amazon, however some of the items I try to purchase can't be sent to a gift wish list address, which is why I'm asking if anyone here can provide this service.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: What country do you live in? Why not use the cash app to sell your Bitcoin there to have funds then use the cash app VCC to buy products on Amazon?If you found someone here willing to do it then don't forget to use escrow because there are some scammers around here.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: I'm not sure that the payment method is related to your problem, is it not because of the limited delivery area? You can try buying the same item from another seller that allows it to be added to the listing, but you may end up getting a higher price. At least it's a last resort.

So what you want to buy will you send the payment to the person first or will you deposit the price before you send the payment for the item on Amazon?Maybe it's better to have an escrow so that both parties don't have doubts about each other because money is being discussed in this matter. It's also difficult because you first donate the item you want to a person you don't even know, and it's the same for you OP, it's also difficult to send immediately because you might think that the money you want will suddenly run out.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Some people in the purse subreddit hinted it could be because products are coming from a 3rd party seller. If that's the case with you, this could be worth trying:Quote from: https://www.reddit.com/r/PurseIO/comments/zueiw8/were_sorry_this_item_cant_be_shipped_to_a_wish/Most likely, Dude doesn't have "share address with 3rd party sellers." checked off on his wishlist options. This limits the gifting to Amazon Fulfilled Orders Only So, try that.As a last resort, you could look into package forwarders available in your place but you probably have to switch to fiat payments for this.
